fields.name: Weapon Robbery:
fields.value: Choose two players. If the first has an Attack Power, they are roleblocked and framed and you attack the second target with their Attack Power. Your visit to the second target will appear to be by the first target by all investigation abilities. (For stuff like veteran, you are still considered to be the visitor)

fields.name: Shot Identifying (Passive):
fields.value: Learn the names and Attack Powers of players that attack you.
